Jeff Schlaver wrote:
> 
> 
> I have come across a situation that the data has a problem. I was
> trying to come up with a way to have the test pass but still raise an
> error. The other option is to some how get it to appear in the
> test-reports.

How can a test pass, but raise an error? What would that mean?

If a test passes, I don't have to fix anything. If a test raises an 
error, I have to fix something (either code or configuration).

So which would it be in this case?
